verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuraju vachunu dootalatho vachchunu daasula paramuna jerchutaku yesuni mukha jyotini Juchedamu jaya dwanulache nuppengadamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sanga vadhuvu pendli kumarundesutho mangala geethamu padumu naadu mahimalo manamu paadedamu yesu snehampu lothunu ruchiyintumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mudra nondhi shuddulu tellanangi darinchi shuddhuni mungita nilichedaru naadu swama kireetamu daalchi andu paaduchu prakaasinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesune preminchiti loka sneham veediti sadaa naa yesutho muchatintun Aaha! bhaasillu mahimatho muchatintun Naadu prabhu yesunitho sukha mondedan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paraloka booradwani mrogagane parishuddulegiri velledaru aa satyuni kalyana vindulo manamesutho narbhatinchedamu{/lang-eng}
